Description: Nondimensional Reynolds number. Reynolds number should be computed based on the reference length in grid units. For example, if you have a mesh with a MAC of 100 in grid units and want to simulate a physical Reynolds number of 1M, then the you should set Reynolds = 100,000.
The Mach number, the ratio of freestream speed to the speed of sound.
The angle of attack in degrees
The side slip angle in degrees
